comment.body:
> [ingsiz](#comment_1_1BDZtoYSyUeEKPCAJ3Pz6wzfXbHzaJWHZU): 英语很差看不懂有没有能教教我的。English is very poor, can someone teach me English？

就是zn简介，当前开发进度，以及未来致力于开发GitHub和市场、私人站点

Excited. I'm so glad to be part of ZeroNet ! ZeroNet is the best P2P sites application I have ever met. Um....I think language is a challenge in develop when programmer comes from different country ...
sandboxed iframe not only limits js, it also limits people's dreams ,wish zite:// or zeronet browser developed a little faster, that we can use google translate in browser, and needn't to care iframe sandbox limit (like how to deal `window.URL.createObjectURL(new window.MediaSource())` host ==null), and alots of web application can move to zeronet without any edit :D
